last_episode_to_air.name: Final Seconds
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the Devils gear up to take on Miami, their biggest opponent, personal conflicts come to a head and Devils Nation will never be the same again.

name: Hit the Floor
overview: Ahsha Hayes enters the wild world of professional basketball when she tries out for the elite L.A. Devil Girls dance team against the wishes of her mother Sloane, a former dancer herself.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Ahsha Hayes is a recent college grad who tries out for the Los Angeles Devil Girls' NBA cheerleading team against her mother's wishes. Pete Davenport, former all-star player for the Devils, comes back to coach the NBA team. Olivia Vincent is a former Devil Girl who oversees the squad. Jelena Howard is the team captain and resident mean girl. She sees Ahsha as a threat. Cue the menacing music.

episodes.name: Game On
episodes.overview: The Devils' season opens with Jelena targeting Ahsha and trying to seize control of the Devil Girls. Meanwhile, Pete and Sloane square off, and Raquel tangles with a difficult ex.

episodes.name: Out of Bounds
episodes.overview: Shocking news stuns Ahsha, to Jelena's great pleasure. Meanwhile, Kyle rebels against dating rules; Raquel is encouraged to take a stand against her ex; and Derek and Terrence clash.

episodes.name: Rebound
episodes.overview: Pete and Sloane confront their past. Meanwhile, Jelena plots Ahsha's failure at an annual calendar photo shoot; and Olivia snoops into the vanishing of a former Devil Girl.

episodes.name: Keep Away
episodes.overview: The Santa Monica Pier is the setting for a Devil Girls performance. Meanwhile, Jelena hatches a plot to create a toxic love triangle, and Ahsha tries to unearth secrets from Sloane's past.

episodes.name: Lights Out
episodes.overview: Ahsha gets trapped in an elevator with Derek when the power goes out in the arena before a game. Elsewhere, Pete reveals a secret to Raquel and is once again shocked by Sloane; and Jelena faces a person from her past.

episodes.name: Moving Screens
episodes.overview: Ahsha's star rises. Elsewhere, Kyle's behavior irks Olivia; Raquel is thrown for a loop, courtesy of Jesse; disturbing news surfaces about Terrence; and Derek is confronted by German.

episodes.name: Fast Break
episodes.overview: Ahsha gets an opportunity to shine when Jelena is put on the sidelines. Elsewhere, German and Ahsha clash; Derek shares his true feelings; and Sloane discovers an alarming secret about the organization.

episodes.name: Benched
episodes.overview: Kyle socializes with a fan who may have hidden motives. Meanwhile, Olivia advises Ahsha in her battle against Jelena; Sloane is caught in an awkward situation; and Terrence plans a surprise.

episodes.name: Turnover
episodes.overview: An unforeseen personnel change shakes up the organization in the Season 1 finale. Also: Ahsha and Derek inch closer to one another; Terrence stuns Jelena with a big decision; and Pete gets romantic with Raquel.

episodes.name: Game Changer
episodes.overview: Romantic sparks fly between all-star Ahsha and Derek in the Season 2 opener. Also: Ahsha clashes with Jelena and new boss Sloane; Pete's estranged wife arrives; and the Devils break ground on a new arena.

episodes.name: Passing
episodes.overview: Ahsha and Derek try to keep their relationship a secret. Elsewhere, Sloane investigates Oscar; German and Derek duel; Pete and Raquel go public; and Zero puts his romantic focus on Jelena.

episodes.name: Behind the Back
episodes.overview: A stunning development marks Sloane's investigation. Meanwhile, Jelena gets the upper hand on Ahsha; Terrence makes a huge decision; Jude and Zero team for a scheme; and Lionel's true motives are exposed.

episodes.name: Full-Court Press
episodes.overview: Ahsha's position with the Devil Girls is put in jeopardy, but an unlikely source emerges to help. Elsewhere, Jelena falls victim to her own moves; Kyle and Beau inch toward the finish line; and a setback plagues Sloane's investigation.

episodes.name: Shattered Glass
episodes.overview: A storm blows in just as Jelena and Kyle must face unwanted visitors from their pasts. Elsewhere, Ahsha confronts the reality of being Derek Roman's girlfriend, and Sloane recruits a new ally.

episodes.name: Blow Out
episodes.overview: Jelena takes aim at Sloane. Meanwhile, Pete and Lionel bond; an unexpected kiss sparks old feelings; Derek and Terrence hit the breaking point; and Ahsha takes a big fall.

episodes.name: Isolation
episodes.overview: Jelena takes advantage of Sloane's absence. Elsewhere, Derek's roast impacts Ahsha and Derek; Kyle receives a unique gift; and Raquel reveals a startling secret to Sloane.

episodes.name: Lockout
episodes.overview: Ahsha, Derek, German, Zero, Jude and Pete face the fallout from their actions. Sloane is forced to revisit her past. And Jelena and Terrence are blindsided by an unwelcome discovery, putting their plan to buy the team in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Carrying
episodes.overview: Tensions between Ahsha, German and Derek reach a breaking point; Jelena faces a nightmare; Sloane begs Pete for a favor; Zero hosts a party; Kyle films her movie.

episodes.name: Killer Crossover
episodes.overview: Ahsha and Sloane are in a race against time, and each other. Jelena makes a big gamble, while Terrence tries to right a wrong. Jude and Zero visit Zero’s tragic past while Kyle makes a shocking confession.

episodes.name: Upset
episodes.overview: Chase Vincent returns with an agenda while Ahsha loses control. Derek and Kyle are powerless. Lionel’s forced to make a desperate move. Meanwhile, Raquel comes clean and Jelena faces her demon.

episodes.name: Loss
episodes.overview: Devils Nation suffers a loss; Lionel's actions reverberate throughout everyone's lives; Zero searches for a face from the past; Jelena struggles with an adversary.

episodes.name: Possession
episodes.overview: Derek's hiding a secret and Ahsha's world will never be the same; Sloane fights for her life; the fight for ownership of the Devils reaches a conclusion.

episodes.name: Slay
episodes.overview: The more things change, the more things stay the same. New Devil Girl dancers step into the arena for a chance at stardom. New rivalries form on and off the court, as the L.A. Devils nation deals with growing pains.

episodes.name: Beast Mode
episodes.overview: German makes a surprise return to Devils Nation, at a crisis point for Derek. The rivalry between Jamie and London heats up, as does the sexual tension between Jude and Noah. Jelena’s dealt a major blow.

episodes.name: Bad Blood
episodes.overview: The stakes are high as a strip poker game stands between Jamie and London being front and center in the next Devil Girl promo campaign. Derek has redemption and revenge in mind.

episodes.name: Number's Up
episodes.overview: Pax confides in Jamie. German asks Derek to do the unthinkable. Eve decides how far she's willing to go to exact her master plan. the Devil Girls get gritty for charity by performing at an underground vogue battle.

episodes.name: End Game
episodes.overview: Secrets are revealed during the ISNY award show, as things come to light. Jude is forced to fight for what he believes in. Battle lines are drawn.

episodes.name: Hot Streak
episodes.overview: With the playoffs looming, the couples must choose between their romances and careers. New alliances are formed. A bombshell revelation may derail the future of the L.A. Devils.

episodes.name: Foul
episodes.overview: As the Devils make it to the playoffs, power plays take place on and off the court threatening to wreck some of the players and cheerleaders, while two say I do.

episodes.name: Final Seconds
episodes.overview: As the Devils gear up to take on Miami, their biggest opponent, personal conflicts come to a head and Devils Nation will never be the same again.
